title: The Bachelorette: Angie Kent is busted reading news articles about herself
text:
She began her journey to find love on The Bachelorette on Wednesday night.

And it seems Angie Kent is keeping a close eye on media coverage of the show, as she was caught reading a news article about herself on Thursday.

The former Gogglebox star, 29, scrolled through an article about The Bachelorette while queuing at the check-in desk at Melbourne Airport.

Off she goes! The Bachelorette's Angie Kent caught a flight at Melbourne Airport on Thursday

Angie dressed up for her short flight back to Sydney in a black and white checkered suit with a deep V neckline.

She accessorised with a black belt, white sneakers and a small red backpack.

The reality star styled her long blonde hair straight, and her makeup consisted of eyeshadow, peachy cheeks and a slick of mascara.

Making headlines! Angie read an article about herself while queuing at the check-in desk

Do you even lift? After flicking through social media and news websites, Angie loaded her large pink suitcase onto a conveyor belt

After flicking through social media and news websites, Angie checked in and then loaded her large pink suitcase onto a conveyor belt.

She strolled through the airport looking very happy indeed while carrying her iPhone and a boarding pass.

Earlier that morning, Angie was seen leaving Nova 100's headquarters, where she had recorded a interview about her new TV role.

Check her out! Angie strolled through the airport looking very happy indeed while carrying her iPhone and a boarding pass

Someone's happy! Angie dressed up for her short flight back to Sydney in a black and white checkered suit with a deep V neckline

She appeared confident as she walked out of the radio studios carrying her red bag.

Angie's debut as the Bachelorette was a modest ratings hit, with 716,000 viewers in the five capital cities watching the season premiere.

By contrast Channel Seven's Bride and Prejudice drew in just 397,000 metro viewers.

Done with interviews! Earlier that morning, Angie was seen leaving Nova 100's headquarters, where she had recorded a interview about her new TV role
description: She began her journey to find love on The Bachelorette on Wednesday night.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
